column2: Unlock the skin for the rare tier of this item to purchase the upgrade recipe.
A recipe to make an ascended longbow with Marshal's (+Power, +Healing, +Condition Damage, and +Precision) stats.
A recipe to make an ascended medium coat with Marshal's (+Power, +Healing, +Condition Damage, and +Precision) stats.
Your bounty target has been defeated!
Complete all renown hearts in the Desert Highlands.
Overcome the challenges in the Nightmare fractal to unlock this item for purchase.
The Order of Shadows have a secret cave base in the Darklands where we plan our effort. You can also find services there.
Clanmarshal Geddi rules at the Pergola, with the Awakened Vizier Kasahn working alongside as his trusted advisor.
Destroy the Forged Assembler keeping the barrier active.
A recipe to make tassets in the style of the Lunatic Court.
A recipe to make an ascended pistol with Marshal's (+Power, +Healing, +Condition Damage, and +Precision) stats.
Map-complete all locations in the Domain of Vabbi.
Optional objective failed; a panicked citizen was slain!
<c=@reminder>This mini can be found inside Black Lion Chests.</c>
Train the jackal to pass through quicksand portals to access otherwise-unreachable locations!
A recipe to make an ascended scepter with Harrier's (+Power, +Healing, and +Concentration) stats.
Unlock the skin for the rare tier of this item to purchase the upgrade recipe.
Some areas of the map require different mounts to reach. Come back when you obtain a springer mount.
Grand High Viscount of Candy Corn
Search the Salt Flats for Balthazar and Vlast.
Open to receive an assortment of cloth.
Complete the related collection achievement in order to unlock purchasing this item.
A recipe to make ascended medium shoulders with Harrier's (+Power, +Healing, and +Concentration) stats.
Weaken the garrison by tearing down propaganda, burning corpses in the mausoleum, defeating hostile Awakened, and defusing mines using kits obtained in crates throughout the area.
Unlock the Exotic tier of this item to purchase this.
Complete the achievement Elon Riverlands Champion Bounties.""
Treacherous Waters: Found in the hidden room.
Who knows what Elona has in store for you. Best be prepared with this pack of items.
Unlock every waypoint in one of the five different regions of Central Tyria for one character.
Help Follower Xunn study the Forgotten.
You helped the exiled people of the Gladefields.
Protect fieldworkers, distribute supplies to carts for collection, convince restless exiles to defect north, and defend exiles from Awakened collectors and other threats.
A recipe to make shoulder armor in the style of the Lunatic Court.
North Maw is the closest, but realm portals open at all of the Maws simultaneously.

Juvenile Elonian raptors rely more on cuteness than leaping ability.
Combine 2 Yellow and 1 Green Raptor with 8 Unidentified Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a White.
Combine 1 Blue and 2 White Raptors with 12 Unidentifed Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Silver.
